34#include <sys/param.h>
35#include <sys/errno.h>
36#include <sys/stat.h>
37#include <sys/endian.h>
38#include <iconv.h>
39#include <err.h>
40#include <stdio.h>
41#include <unistd.h>
42#include <strings.h>
43#include <stdlib.h>
44#include <sysexits.h>
45#include <util.h>
46
47#include <cflib.h>
48
49#include <netsmb/smb_lib.h>
50#include <netsmb/smb_conn.h>
51#include <netsmb/smb_rap.h>
52
53#include "common.h"
54
55static const char *shtype[] = {
56 "disk",
57 "printer",
58 "comm", /* Communications device */
59 "pipe", /* IPC Inter process communication */
60 "unknown"
61};
62
63int
64cmd_view(int argc, char *argv[])
65{
66 struct smb_ctx sctx, *ctx = &sctx;
67 struct smb_share_info_1 *rpbuf, *ep;
68 char *cp;
69 u_int16_t type;
70 int error, opt, bufsize, i, entries, total;
71
72
73 if (argc < 2)
74 view_usage();
75 if (smb_ctx_init(ctx, argc, argv, SMBL_VC, SMBL_VC, SMB_ST_ANY) != 0)
76 exit(1);
77 if (smb_ctx_readrc(ctx) != 0)
78 exit(1);
79 if (smb_rc)
80 rc_close(smb_rc);
81 while ((opt = getopt(argc, argv, STDPARAM_OPT)) != EOF) {
82 switch(opt){
83 case STDPARAM_ARGS:
84 error = smb_ctx_opt(ctx, opt, optarg);
85 if (error)
86 exit(1);
87 break;
88 default:
89 view_usage();
90 /*NOTREACHED*/
91 }
92 }
93#ifdef APPLE
94 if (loadsmbvfs())
95 errx(EX_OSERR, "SMB filesystem is not available");
96#endif
97 smb_ctx_setshare(ctx, "IPC$", SMB_ST_ANY);
98 if (smb_ctx_resolve(ctx) != 0)
99 exit(1);
100 error = smb_ctx_lookup(ctx, SMBL_SHARE, SMBLK_CREATE);
101 if (error) {
102 smb_error("could not login to server %s", error, ctx->ct_ssn.ioc_srvname);
103 exit(1);
104 }
105 printf("Share Type Comment\n");
106 printf("-------------------------------\n");
107 bufsize = 0xffe0; /* samba notes win2k bug with 65535 */
108 rpbuf = malloc(bufsize);
109 error = smb_rap_NetShareEnum(ctx, 1, rpbuf, bufsize, &entries, &total);
110 if (error &&
111 error != (SMB_ERROR_MORE_DATA | SMB_RAP_ERROR)) {
112 smb_error("unable to list resources", error);
113 exit(1);
114 }
115 for (ep = rpbuf, i = 0; i < entries; i++, ep++) {
116 type = le16toh(ep->shi1_type);
117
118 cp = (char*)rpbuf + ep->shi1_remark;
119 printf("%-12s %-10s %s\n", ep->shi1_netname,
120 shtype[min(type, sizeof shtype / sizeof(char *) - 1)],
121 ep->shi1_remark ? nls_str_toloc(cp, cp) : "");
122 }
123 printf("\n%d shares listed from %d available\n", entries, total);
124 free(rpbuf);
125 return 0;
126}
127
128
129void
130view_usage(void)
131{
132 fprintf(stderr, "Usage: %s view [connection options] //[user@]server\n",
133 getprogname());
134 exit(1);
135}
